embed.description: All Values are kept the same except the type of transition The top and bottom border is most likely due to window-mode in League of legends,when recorded Most transitions as graph: https://easings.net/en New League Tool: https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/league-director-replay-camera-tool Camera API: https://developer.riotgames.com/replay-apis.html linear snap smoothStep smootherStep qudraticEaseIn quadraticEaseOut quadraticEaseInOut cubicEaseIn cubicEaseOut cubicEaseInOut quarticEaseIn quarticEaseOut quarticEaseInOut quinticEaseIn quinticEaseOut quintivEaseInOut sineEaseIn sineEaseOut sineEaseInOut circularEaseIn circularEaseOut circularEaseInOut exponentialEaseIn exponentialEaseOut exponentialEaseInOut elasticEaseIn elasticEaseOut elasticEaseInOut backEaseIn backEaseOut backEaseInOut bounceEaseIn bounceEaseOut bounceEaseInOut Those Values were used in this order (dont know where they came from just took them,probably influence how abrupt some are)4892,37 2178,17 509,14
